about_the_game:
"The Cavern Diary" is a first-person, Oriental style horror adventure decryption game.

The story takes place in Shenyou City (pseudonym), which combines social elements and a sense of time, and contains literary metaphors. Players can play twists and turns and bizarre stories, experience the details hidden in the story that make people think about and feel scared, and feel the unique atmosphere of ghosts and charms in the East.

The scenes are both modern and ancient, with both reality and fantasy. The scene has a certain degree of freedom, where players can feel the fun of adventure, exploration, collection and puzzle solving, but they must always be vigilant, because danger may approach at any time.



About the story


Part of it is taken from the works of Mr. Lu Xun.
This story is purely fictitious and any similarity is purely coincidental.
The clues are intricate, and some have a certain symbolic meaning.
If you have played the game, then the story is already yours, and how to interpret it is up to you.



About the game design


First-person perspective.
There is more than one game ending.
Introduce some designs with a sense of time, sometimes like an old movie.
The puzzles are closely connected with the script, and some puzzles are related to the sound, so please don't mute it.
Some puzzles may require some other knowledge. It doesn't matter if they can't be solved, but it may affect the outcome.



About the character


They are like mirrors, living in the game and above the world.
They all have their own present and past, but no matter how struggling, there is nothing to do. You can learn about them through clues.

short_description: "The Cavern Diary" is a Oriental style horror game. In the midnight, Hua Xiaoxi was on the way home as usual, but she felt the strange look behind her. She never expected that she would be in this peaceful neighborhood, with a sense of evil is following her. Can she get out of danger? nobody knows.
